thread.title: Gwen Stefani’s Ex Gavin Rossdale Spotted Making Out With Mystery Woman
thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani’s Ex Gavin Rossdale Spotted Making Out With Mystery Woman

author: Mandy Robinson
title: Gwen Stefani’s Ex Gavin Rossdale Spotted Making Out With Mystery Woman
text:
Mandy Robinson 
Gavin Rossdale and Gwen Stefani are going through a very messy divorce. The rumors have been flying that Gwen is moving on with Blake Shelton, even though the two are denying it so far. Now Radar Online is sharing that Gavin Rossdale is moving on as well and was even spotted out in public with a mystery brunette. Gavin and Gwen called it quits 2 months ago, but they do have 3 children together so this divorce is not turning out to be an easy one. 
Rossdale was spotted with a mystery brunette while at dinner at the ‘Operation Smile 2015 Gala’ in Los Angeles last week. A very reliable source watched it all go down and revealed what they saw with Gavin and his mystery brunette last week 
Gavin brought a beautiful tall brunette woman to the event and, at first, it seemed that it was his publicist or something. They came in together and sat next to each other at dinner, but made sure to keep their distance because they knew people were watching them. After drinks started flowing following dinner, Gavin followed her to the bathroom at the same time I was walking towards the restroom. She left the restroom just before I did and when I walked out, Gavin and her were kissing! 
The source explained that only 2 people saw Gavin Rossdale kissing this woman and it was definitely the woman he was sitting by at dinner. It was obvious that Gavin didn’t want everyone to see it go down and they were trying to be secretive about it. So far nobody knows who the woman was that was caught smooching Gavin Rossdale last week. A photo posted by Gwen Stefani (@gwenstefani) on Sep 18, 2015 at 6:59pm PDT 
When Gavin Rossdale and Gwen Stefani decided to split, she had accused him of cheating with their nanny. There was never any proof that he took things too far, but Gwen fired her and thought that something was going on. Rossdale’s nanny happened to be a very pretty brunette. It is unknown if this could be the same woman or if Gavin just likes brunettes now that he is moving on from his blonde wife Gwen Stefani. 
OK! Magazine recently shared that Gwen Stefani is not happy that Gavin Rossdale has been spotted hanging out with their nanny since they split. Sources say that this ex-nanny dresses like Gwen and she is not happy that the two are together. The source says that Gavin Rossdale has been hanging out with her at his bachelor pad and doesn’t want to be seen in public with her. This nanny was the cause of Gwen’s jealousy during her marriage to Gavin Rossdale. A photo posted by Gavin Rossdale (@gavinrossdale) on Jul 28, 2015 at 6:38pm PDT 
When Gavin Rossdale and Gwen Stefani were married, Gwen fired the nanny because she thought something was going on. The proof was never found, but these two gave her reason to believe that there was more to it than just friends spending time together. A source explained that Gwen Stefani feels betrayed. 
Gwen loaned her clothes, and was very generous with the younger woman. The nanny was very attractive, but in the beginning, Gwen trusted her and treated her as a younger sister/best friend. 
A source went on to say that Gwen Stefani is not allowing her children with Gavin Rossdale to be around the nanny at all. Rossdale may be spending time with her, but their 3 kids are not allowed to do it. Was it the nanny that Gavin was spotted with last week? Nobody really knows for sure, but it is obvious that Rossdale is moving on from Gwen at this time. 
Do you think that Gavin Rossdale is hooking up with the nanny? Are you shocked that he is already kissing someone? Sound off in the comments below on your thoughts. 
[Picture Source Kevin Winter/Getty Images for CBS Radio; Instagram]
